page.title: 09HOME LIFE
page.content: {A BOY AT WEEKENDS. DURING THE HOLIDAYS,I RISE ABOUT{8.30, AND AFTER BREAKFAST I WATCH{T.V.}UNTIL ABOUT{10.00.}THEN I GO OUT TO PLAY WITH MY FRIENDS,SOMETIMES AT THE PARK ON MY BIKE,OR PLAY ARMY OR HIDE AND SEEK. NOON IS DINNER TIME.THEN I PLAY OUT AGAIN UNTIL{5.00.}AT{10 PM}AFTER SUPPER I GO TO BED. {A GIRL DURING THE WEEKDAYS I RISE AT{7AM}AND GATHER EGGS,AND FEED MY{PONY,}THEN HAVE BREAKFAST AND CLEAN MY TEETH.AFTER THAT I CATCH THE{SCHOOL {BUS.}AT SCHOOL WE DO{LANGUAGE}UNTIL BREAK,THEN{MATHS}UNTIL LUNCH, WHICH WE EAT IN THE VILLAGE HALL.IN THE AFTERNOON WE DO MUSIC AND ARTS AND CRAFT OR SCIENCE,THEN GO HOME AT{ {3PM.}WHEN I GET HOME I FEED MY GOAT, DO MY HOMEWORK,THEN RIDE.AFTER THAT I WATCH T.V.UNTIL {9PM}WHICH IS BEDTIME. {
